CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH( CloseDate ), 1, "10 - January", 2, "11 - February", 3, "12 - March", 4, "01 - April", 5, "02 - May", 6, "03 - June", 7, "04 - July", 8, "05 - August", 9, "06 - September", 10, "07 - October", 11, "08 -November", 12, "09 - December", "None")
CustomField.label: Fiscal month
